song_name: When All is Said and Done
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, When All is Said and Done has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: When All is Said and Done has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and D Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
